info.title: Neosantara AI API
info.description: OpenAI-compatible LLM Gateway with unified interface for multiple providers.

get.description: Lists the currently available models, and provides information about each one such as the owner and availability.

post.description: Estimate the number of tokens for a given set of messages and model.
Calculate the estimated cost based on token counts and model pricing.
Creates an image given a prompt.

x-codeSamples.label: OpenAI Node.js SDK
Python SDK
x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    api_key='YOUR_NUSA_KEY',
    base_url='https://api.neosantara.xyz/v1'
)

response = client.images.generate(
    model='neosantara-gen-2045',
    prompt='Pemandangan alam Indonesia yang indah',
    n=1,
    size='1024x1024'
)
print(response.data[0].url)

get.description: Get a list of recent conversation sessions for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a model response for the given chat conversation. Supports streaming and tool calling.

x-codeSamples.label: OpenAI Node.js SDK
OpenAI Python SDK
x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    api_key='YOUR_NUSA_KEY',
    base_url='https://api.neosantara.xyz/v1'
)

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model='nusantara-pro',
    messages=[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'Halo, apa kabar?'}]
)

x-codeSamples.label: Python SDK
x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    api_key='YOUR_NUSA_KEY',
    base_url='https://api.neosantara.xyz/v1'
)

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model='nusantara-base',
    messages=[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'Halo, apa kabar?'}]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js SDK

post.description: Creates a completion for the provided prompt and parameters.
Start a video generation job from text or image prompts.
Extract text from images using advanced OCR models.
Create a response using the specified model and instructions.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl https://api.neosantara.xyz/v1/responses \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $NUSA_KEY" \
  -d '{
    "model": "nusantara-pro",
    "input": "Jelaskan apa itu Nusantara AI",
    "instructions": "Gunakan bahasa yang santai."
  }'

x-codeSamples.label: Axios
Python SDK
x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    api_key='YOUR_NUSA_KEY',
    base_url='https://api.neosantara.xyz/v1'
)

response = client.responses.create(
    model='nusantara-base',
    input='Halo, apa kabar?',
    instructions='Jawab dengan gaya santai.',
    store=True
)
print(response.output_text)

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js SDK

get.description: Get a list of models available via the Anthropic-compatible API.
Get information about a specific model via the Anthropic-compatible API.

post.description: Create a message using the Anthropic-compatible API. Supports tool use and streaming.

x-codeSamples.label: Python SDK
x-codeSamples.source:
import anthropic

client = anthropic.Anthropic(
    api_key='YOUR_NUSA_KEY',
    base_url='https://api.neosantara.xyz/anthropic'
)

message = client.messages.create(
    model='nusantara-base',
    max_tokens=1024,
    messages=[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'Halo, apa kabar?'}]
)
print(message.content[0].text)

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js SDK

post.description: Count the number of tokens in a message using the Anthropic-compatible API.

get.description: Retrieves a model instance, providing basic information about the model.

x-codeSamples.label: Python SDK
x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    api_key='YOUR_NUSA_KEY',
    base_url='https://api.neosantara.xyz/v1'
)

response = client.embeddings.create(
    model='nusa-embedding-0001',
    input='Kecerdasan Buatan adalah masa depan.'
)
print(response.data[0].embedding)
